alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 23 at 6:45PM PST until November 24 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Increasing east winds late tonight into Thursday morning will result in fog eroding from east to west across the Portland/Vancouver metro with the least amount of fog expected around Gresham, Troutdale, Camas and Washougal. Fog will be most prevalent across Washington County and northern Clark County and may not clear those areas until near or after 8 AM.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
